modName: Wings - Devil Wings for UNP UNPB
summary:
Adds 5 pairs of devil wings to Skyrim, tested for UNP/UNPB.
Female only.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://img59.imageshack.us/img59/2038/bannerxgc.jpg[/img]

[font=impact][size=6][color=silver]Ter[/color][color=fuchsia]m[/color][color=silver]s:[/color] [/size][/font]
[color=papayawhip][FONT=helvetica][size=4]You may freely re-upload this mod, but you must leave all the files within the archive intact. 
You may freely modify my files for your personal use, but you MUST obtain my permission before releasing your work to the public. I still would like to ensure that all derivative works maintain a certain level of quality standard.[/size][/font][/color]



[font=impact][size=6][color=fuchsia]I[/color][color=silver]ntroduction: [/color][/size][/font]
[color=papayawhip][FONT=helvetica][size=2]NOTE: I do not feel that this mod is substantial enough to bear the \"elewin\" designation, hence why it\'s just ... Wings.
NOTE 2: The latex shader utilized on some of the wings in my screenshots isn\'t quite ready for release due to its relatively heavy performance cost; the release version utilizes Bethesda\'s default shaders, thus the wings you get may exhibit slight lighting difference compared to the sample shots.[/size]

[size=4]This mod adds 5 pairs of devil wings to Skyrim. See screenshots for preview.
No known issues/conflicts.
Female only[/size][/font][/color]



[font=impact][size=6][color=silver]Require[/color][color=fuchsia]m[/color][color=silver]ents[/color]: [/size][/font]
[color=papayawhip][FONT=helvetica][size=4]Skyrim 1.8.151 Update. If you have patch 1.8.151 installed and still do not see the chest, then use console command \"help wings 4\" to acquire the item codes.[/size][/font][/color]



[font=impact][size=6][color=silver]Installat[/color][color=fuchsia]i[/color][color=silver]on:[/color] [/size][/font]
[color=transparent]11[/color][FONT=impact][size=5][color=silver]NMM:[/color][/size][/font]
[color=papayawhip][FONT=helvetica][size=4]Download, activate the mod, enjoy.[/size][/font][/color]

[color=transparent]11[/color][color=silver][FONT=impact][size=5]Manual:[/size][/font][/color]
[color=papayawhip][FONT=helvetica][size=4]Download, unpack, place \"Wings.esp\" and \"Wings.bsa\" inside your \"Skyrim\\Data\" folder, activate \"Wings.esp\" in launcher, enjoy.[/size][/font][/color]



[font=impact][size=6][color=silver]Lo[/color][color=fuchsia]c[/color][color=silver]ation:[/color] [/size][/font]
[color=papayawhip][FONT=helvetica][size=4]In a strongbox by the entrance of the Drunken Huntsman in Whiterun.[/size][/font][/color]



[font=impact][size=6][color=silver]Uninstallation[/color][color=fuchsia]:[/color] [/size][/font]
[color=papayawhip][FONT=helvetica][size=4]Remove[/font][/size]

[font=garamond][size=4]Wings.esp
Wings.bsa[/size][/font]

[size=4][FONT=helvetica]From your \"Skyrim\\Data\" folder.[/font][/size][/color]



=======

[font=impact][size=4][color=silver]Credits:[/color] [/size][/font]
[color=papayawhip][FONT=helvetica][size=3]Autodesk
Adobe
Bethesda[/size][/font][/color]
author: Elewin
